name: Dmitriy Davydovich
text: Ok 5 stars?! Yea I know but hear me out. The pizza is not bad, there are tons of topics and the prices are cheap... so for a fast food pizza it deserves its 5 stars

name: Robyn Lloyd
text: Being from near Detroit originally, I love Little Caesars Pizza, but it's difficult to find that same taste so far from its native state. This one in Clemson is pretty tasty! Pizza and other options are generally cooked thoroughly, not …More

name: Karen Farmer
text: If you're looking for an unlimited buffet this is the place to go. Great service, reasonably priced. Game room and can serve large groups. Also a private party room. Great for birthdays or special occasions. Waitresses are very attentive. My family goes there a lot.

name: A J
text: Normally we have had a decent experience. Not this time! Tonight was my last time ever going there!!! Rude manager named Angelia C. Felt bad for other employees being bossed around by her. Many customers were complaining behind me that they …More

name: Treyleelee
text: The pizza is decent but they are pretty slow on making the pizza we it advertises hot-n-ready..

name: James Atkins
text: Hot and 6 to 7 minutes. 10-15 if there folks already waiting. Ready ovens stay empty.

name: Chad Shaffer
text: This was the worst experiance I have ever had with these guys, I ordered from the app 2 pizzas 1 was cooked and the other was par cooked. I called and the guy tells me their is no Manager on today find that hard to believe but it is what it …More

name: Bradley Culbertson
text: This has to be one of the worst experiences ever. I was in line for over an 25 minutes. Finally, ordered and waited another 20 mins to only have the manager skip my order. When I approached the manager, politely, I was told I would have to …More

name: Ashish Kumar
text: Perfect place for a quick meal at very decent price.

name: Thomas Houin
text: Great service at this location and you can't beat a 5 dollar pizza

text: Easy phone ordering and helpful staff!

name: C J
text: Why are y’all not open on the weekends anymore?! I do not appreciate it.

text: Who doesn't love pizza, and especially a pizza for 5 bucks

name: Brennen Owens
text: Pizza was burnt, but management made it right. Everybody makes mistakes, but it isn't always corrected in a timely, and satisfying manner, like what was done for me at this location.

name: Joshua Elgin
text: Terrible service. Pizzas are not hot-and-ready, contrary to what their sign says. To hell with you, Little Ceasers. You could've atleast given me a free damn cup of ranch.
